Lyric:
[by:hondoes]
[00:09.21]I know you love her, love her
[00:11.18]But deep down under the covers, covers
[00:13.79]Does she know that I am the other, other
[00:17.00]Does she?
[00:18.23]
[00:19.10]Well it's not like I planned this, planned this
[00:21.14]But you were so fucking romantic, romantic
[00:23.81]Why you always acting so frantic, frantic
[00:26.93]Listen to me
[00:30.08]Just love me, love me, love me, love me when the lights go down
[00:34.90]And hold me, hold me, hold me till it's dawn
[00:40.01]And maybe you can make me forgive myself
[00:45.19]And leave me, leave me, leave me when it's done
[00:47.99]
[00:50.13]Cause you've been nothing but trouble
[00:54.01]I know what you're up to
[00:57.64]Trying to get into my head
[01:00.32]Cause you've been nothing but trouble
[01:04.12]I know what you're up to
[01:07.65]Play it over and over again
[01:10.16]
[01:29.83]No I won't blow your cover, cover
[01:31.99]I know it's not your fault that you love her, love her
[01:34.34]And I'm betting that you will discover
[01:36.83]I'm not someone you can try to keep
[01:39.05]
[01:39.83]Well it's not like I planned this, planned this
[01:42.04]But you were so fucking romantic, romantic
[01:44.63]Why you always acting so frantic, frantic
[01:47.80]Listen to me
[01:50.78]Just love me, love me, love me, love me when the lights go down
[01:55.87]And hold me, hold me, hold me till it's dawn
[02:00.84]And maybe you can make me forgive myself
[02:06.04]And leave me, leave me, leave me when it's done
[02:08.91]
[02:10.95]Cause you've been nothing but trouble
[02:14.84]I know what you're up to
[02:18.73]Trying to get into my head
[02:21.33]Cause you've been nothing but trouble
[02:24.96]I know what you're up to
[02:28.46]Play it over and over again
[02:31.00]
